text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE371Patient self-reported as not ready/willingReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient self-reported as not ready/willing
    HIV.D.DE372Not completed education, support and preparation for ARTReasons for delayed ART initiation - Not completed education, support and preparation for ART
    HIV.D.DE373Fear of disclosureReasons for delayed ART initiation - Fear of disclosure
    HIV.D.DE374Patient lacks financesReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient lacks finances
    HIV.D.DE375Initiated on TB treatmentReasons for delayed ART initiation - Initiated on TB treatment
    HIV.D.DE376Patient initiated on treatment for TB meningitisReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient initiated on treatment for TB meningitis
    HIV.D.DE377Patient diagnosed with cryptococcal meningitisReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient diagnosed with cryptococcal meningitis
    HIV.D.DE378Patient diagnosed with histoplasmosisReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient diagnosed with histoplasmosis
    HIV.D.DE379Patient critically/severely illReasons for delayed ART initiation - Patient critically/severely ill
    HIV.D.DE380OtherReasons for delayed ART initiation - Other

name: ReasonsfordelayedARTinitiationCodes
title: Reasons for delayed ART initiation Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Reasons for delayed ART initiation element

concept.display: Not completed education, support and preparation for ART
Patient initiated on treatment for TB meningitis
